mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT RL.MEMBER_NO FROM RECIPE_LIKE RL JOIN RECIPE R USING(RECIPE_NO) WHERE R.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} UNION SELECT BL.MEMBER_NO FROM BOARD_LIKE BL JOIN BOARD B USING(BOARD_NO) WHERE B.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECIPE_BOOKMARK JOIN RECIPE R USING(RECIPE_NO) WHERE R.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "RECIPE" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT RECIPE_TAG_NAME FROM "RECIPE_TAG" WHERE RECIPE_NO = #{recipeNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%${memberNickname}%'
AND MEMBER_EMAIL LIKE '%${memberEmail}%'
AND MEMBER_ID LIKE '%${memberId}%'
SELECT MEMBER_NO ,MEMBER_EMAIL ,MEMBER_NICKNAME ,MEMBER_AUTHORITY, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_DEL_FL FROM "MEMBER" ORDER BY MEMBER_NO

SELECT MEMBER_NO ,MEMBER_EMAIL ,MEMBER_NICKNAME ,MEMBER_AUTHORITY, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_DEL_FL FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_DEL_FL IN ('N','Y')
AND MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%${memberNickname}%'
AND MEMBER_EMAIL LIKE '%${memberEmail}%'
AND MEMBER_ID LIKE '%${memberId}%'
ORDER BY MEMBER_NO

SELECT MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_PROFILE, TO_CHAR(MEMBER_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') MEMBER_ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_AUTHORITY, MEMBER_INTRO, MEMBER_NO FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT (R.RECIPE_NO)) FROM RECIPE R LEFT JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN RECIPE_STEP RS ON(R.RECIPE_NO = RS.RECIPE_NO) LEFT JOIN RECIPE_TAG RT ON(R.RECIPE_NO = RT.RECIPE_NO) LEFT JOIN RECIPE_MATERIAL RM ON(R.RECIPE_NO = RM.RECIPE_NO)
WHERE RECIPE_DEL_FL = 'N' AND RECIPE_TITLE LIKE '%${searchRecipe.recipeTitle}%'
AND MEMBER_NO = #{searchRecipe.memberNo}
AND MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%${searchRecipe.memberNickname}%' AND (RECIPE_INTRO LIKE '%${searchRecipe.recipeContent}%' OR RECIPE_TIP LIKE '%${searchRecipe.recipeContent}%' OR RECIPE_STEP_CONTENT LIKE '%${searchRecipe.recipeContent}%')
AND RECIPE_TAG_NAME LIKE '%${tag}%'

SELECT DISTINCT (R.RECIPE_NO), RECIPE_TITLE, RECIPE_THUMBNAIL, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECIPE_LIKE RL WHERE RL.RECIPE_NO = R.RECIPE_NO) RECIPE_LIKE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_NO, RECIPE_HITS FROM RECIPE R LEFT JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN RECIPE_STEP RS ON(R.RECIPE_NO = RS.RECIPE_NO) LEFT JOIN RECIPE_TAG RT ON(R.RECIPE_NO = RT.RECIPE_NO) LEFT JOIN RECIPE_MATERIAL RM ON(R.RECIPE_NO = RM.RECIPE_NO)
WHERE RECIPE_DEL_FL = 'N' AND RECIPE_TITLE LIKE '%${searchRecipe.recipeTitle}%'
AND MEMBER_NO = #{searchRecipe.memberNo}
AND MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%${searchRecipe.memberNickname}%'
AND (RECIPE_INTRO LIKE '%${searchRecipe.recipeContent}%' OR RECIPE_TIP LIKE '%${searchRecipe.recipeContent}%' OR RECIPE_STEP_CONTENT LIKE '%${searchRecipe.recipeContent}%')
AND RECIPE_TAG_NAME LIKE '%${tag}%'
ORDER BY RECIPE_NO ASC

AND MEMBER_NO IN
